name: Strammer Max (German Open-Face Sandwich with Ham, Cheese, and Fried Egg)
author: Alois
summary: Hearty open-face sandwich with ham, cheese, and egg.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Butter the bread with 1 tablespoon butter and place on a large serving plate
Heat a skillet over medium heat
Cover with Gruyere cheese and melt, 1 to 2 minutes more
Heat remaining butter in another skillet over medium heat
Add egg and cook until white is set, about 3 minutes
Flip carefully and cook until set but yolk is still runny, 1 minute more
Cover the bread with ham and cheese and top with the egg
Sprinkle with parsley, salt, and pepper
